column1: output_list
The safe way to double your money is to fold it over once and put it in your pocket. - Kin Hubbard
When I was young I thought that money was the most important thing in life; now that I am old I know that it is. - Oscar Wilde
The lack of money is the root of all evil. - Mark Twain
There's no such thing as a free lunch. - Milton Friedman
Never spend your money before you have earned it. - Thomas Jefferson
I have no money, no resources, no hopes. I am the happiest man alive. - Henry Miller
Money won't create success, the freedom to make it will. - Nelson Mandela
A rich man is nothing but a poor man with money. - W. C. Fields
A bank is a place that will lend you money if you can prove that you don't need it. - Bob Hope
Money has never made man happy, nor will it, there is nothing in its nature to produce happiness. The more of it one has the more one wants. - Benjamin Franklin
A nation that continues year after year to spend more money on military defense than on programs of social uplift is approaching spiritual doom. - Martin Luther King, Jr.
Money is only a tool. It will take you wherever you wish, but it will not replace you as the driver. - Ayn Rand
I'd like to live as a poor man with lots of money. - Pablo Picasso
Greed is not a financial issue. It's a heart issue. - Andy Stanley
If women didn't exist, all the money in the world would have no meaning. - Aristotle Onassis
Friendship is like money, easier made than kept. - Samuel Butler
Do what you love and the money will follow. - Marsha Sinetar
It's all about the money. - Joe Jackson
The hardest thing to understand in the world is the income tax. - Albert Einstein
The problem is not that people are taxed too little, the problem is that government spends too much. - Ronald Reagan
A fool and his money are soon parted. - Thomas Tusser
A bank is a place where they lend you an umbrella in fair weather and ask for it back when it begins to rain. - Robert Frost
A good reputation is more valuable than money. - Publilius Syrus
There are people who have money and people who are rich. - Coco Chanel
No man's credit is as good as his money. - John Dewey
All I ask is the chance to prove that money can't make me happy. - Spike Milligan
I have always been afraid of banks. - Andrew Jackson
A billion here, a billion there, and pretty soon you're talking about real money. - Everett Dirksen
Money cannot buy peace of mind. It cannot heal ruptured relationships, or build meaning into a life that has none. - Richard M. DeVos
Don't let making a living prevent you from making a life. - John Wooden
Wealth flows from energy and ideas. - William Feather
My pride fell with my fortunes. - William Shakespeare
If we command our wealth, we shall be rich and free; if our wealth commands us, we are poor indeed. - Edmund Burke
Money can't buy love, but it improves your bargaining position. - Christopher Marlowe
Money is better than poverty, if only for financial reasons. - Woody Allen
A wise man should have money in his head, but not in his heart. - Jonathan Swift
Profit is sweet, even if it comes from deception. - Sophocles
Many people take no care of their money till they come nearly to the end of it, and others do just the same with their time. - Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
A man in debt is so far a slave. - Ralph Waldo Emerson
All riches have their origin in mind. Wealth is in ideas - not money. - Robert Collier
Where large sums of money are concerned, it is advisable to trust nobody. - Agatha Christie
Never confuse the size of your paycheck with the size of your talent. - Marlon Brando
A little thought and a little kindness are often worth more than a great deal of money. - John Ruskin
I've got all the money I'll ever need, if I die by four o'clock. - Henny Youngman
Real riches are the riches possessed inside. - B. C. Forbes
Alimony is like buying hay for a dead horse. - Groucho Marx
The importance of money flows from it being a link between the present and the future. - John Maynard Keynes
Money makes your life easier. If you're lucky to have it, you're lucky. - Al Pacino
Money is our madness, our vast collective madness. - D. H. Lawrence
That money talks, I'll not deny, I heard it once: It said, 'Goodbye'. - Richard Armour
Money is a mechanism for control. - David Korten
Lack of money is the root of all evil. - George Bernard Shaw
Put not your trust in money, but put your money in trust. - Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.
Money will buy a pretty good dog, but it won't buy the wag of his tail. - Josh Billings
A simple fact that is hard to learn is that the time to save money is when you have some. - Joe Moore
My goal wasn't to make a ton of money. It was to build good computers. - Steve Wozniak
There is a gigantic difference between earning a great deal of money and being rich. - Marlene Dietrich
Many folks think they aren't good at earning money, when what they don't know is how to use it. - Frank A. Clark
Money is a strange business. People who haven't got it aim it strongly. People who have are full of troubles. - Ayrton Senna
Wealth often takes away chances from men as well as poverty. There is none to tell the rich to go on striving, for a rich man makes the law that hallows and hollows his own life. - Sean O'Casey
A man with money is no match against a man on a mission. - Doyle Brunson
If God has allowed me to earn so much money, it is because He knows I give it all away. - Edith Piaf
Money is just a way of keeping score. - H. L. Hunt
If saving money is wrong, I don't want to be right! - William Shatner
Poverty makes you sad as well as wise. - Bertolt Brecht
Don't judge me. I made a lot of money. - Samantha Bee
There is no such thing as a good tax. - Unknown
Anybody who thinks money will make you happy, hasn't got money. - David Geffen
All my life I knew that there was all the money you could want out there. All you have to do is go after it. - Curtis Carlson
Liking money like I like it, is nothing less than mysticism. Money is a glory. - Salvador Dali
If the money we donate helps one child or can ease the pain of one parent, those funds are well spent. - Carl Karcher
Ben Franklin may have discovered electricity- but it is the man who invented the meter who made the money. - Earl Warren
Money: power at its most liquid. - Mason Cooley
Credit buying is much like being drunk. The buzz happens immediately and gives you a lift... The hangover comes the day after. - Joyce Brothers
You have to go broke three times to learn how to make a living. - Casey Stengel
As human beings, we're very materialistic and have all this stuff - furs and cars and diamonds and money. - Smokey Robinson
Poverty breeds lack of self-reliance. - Daniel De Leon
Money makes your life easier. If you're lucky to have it, you're lucky. - Robert De Niro
I am happy to make money. I want to make more money, make more music, eat Big Macs and drink Budweisers. - Kid Rock
Money's a horrid thing to follow, but a charming thing to meet. - Henry James
The creditor hath a better memory than the debtor. - James Howell
I'm scared to death of being poor. It's like a fat girl who loses 500 pounds but is always fat inside. I grew up poor and will always feel poor inside. It's my pet paranoia. - Cher
Pennies do not come from heaven. They have to be earned here on earth. - Margaret Thatcher
It's easier to force feed people than it is to give 'em what they want. It makes more money. - Merle Haggard
I, Joan Crawford, I believe in the dollar. Everything I earn, I spend. - Joan Crawford
No one's ever achieved financial fitness with a January resolution that's abandoned by February. - Suze Orman
Wealth is the ability to fully experience life. - Henry David Thoreau
The greatest luxury of riches is that they enable you to escape so much good advice. - Arthur Helps
Recession is when a neighbor loses his job. Depression is when you lose yours. - Ronald Reagan
If American men are obsessed with money, American women are obsessed with weight. The men talk of gain, the women talk of loss, and I do not know which talk is the more boring. - Marya Mannes
A man who gives his children habits of industry provides for them better than by giving them fortune. - Richard Whately

In its famous paradox, the equation of money and excrement, psychoanalysis becomes the first science to state what common sense and the poets have long known - that the essence of money is in its absolute worthlessness. - Norman O. Brown
It is usually people in the money business, finance, and international trade that are really rich. - Robin Leach
Wealth and want equally harden the human heart. - Theodore Parker
In suggesting gifts: Money is appropriate, and one size fits all. - William Randolph Hearst
The substitute for knowledge is money. - Gordon Bethune
Men make counterfeit money; in many more cases, money makes counterfeit men. - Sydney J. Harris
So you think that money is the root of all evil. Have you ever asked what is the root of all money? - Ayn Rand

Simply by not owning three medium-sized castles in Tuscany I have saved enough money in the last forty years on insurance premiums alone to buy a medium-sized castle in Tuscany. - Ludwig Mies van der Rohe
There's just one thing I can't figure out. My income tax! - Nat King Cole
And plenty makes us poor. - John Dryden
I've made all my money on my own without my family and I work very hard. - Paris Hilton
I don't spend much money on clothes; I never did. - Lauren Hutton
Let us not be satisfied with just giving money. Money is not enough, money can be got, but they need your hearts to love them. So, spread your love everywhere you go. - Mother Teresa
Friends and acquaintances are the surest passport to fortune. - Arthur Schopenhauer
The most efficient labor-saving device is still money. - Franklin P. Jones
If money was my only motivation, I would organize myself differently. - Placido Domingo
Money is always there but the pockets change; it is not in the same pockets after a change, and that is all there is to say about money. - Gertrude Stein
Sooner or later, we sell out for money. - Tony Randall
A man is usually more careful of his money than of his principles. - Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.
Money often costs too much. - Ralph Waldo Emerson
We've got to put a lot of money into changing behavior. - Bill Gates
You know, a lot of people are just interested in, in building a company so they can make money and get out. - Arthur Rock
I'm not broke. Like everybody else, I owe money. - Marlee Matlin
He that is of the opinion money will do everything may well be suspected of doing everything for money. - Benjamin Franklin
It is more rewarding to watch money change the world than watch it accumulate. - Gloria Steinem
Wealth should not be seized, but the god-given is much better. - Hesiod
For I can raise no money by vile means. - William Shakespeare
I am fiercely loyal to those willing to put their money where my mouth is. - Paul Harvey
Who covets more is evermore a slave. - Robert Herrick
Here's how I think of my money - as soldiers - I send them out to war everyday. I want them to take prisoners and come home, so there's more of them. - Kevin O'Leary
A fool and his money get a lot of publicity. - Al Bernstein
It is money, money, money! Not ideas, not principles, but money that reigns supreme in American politics. - Robert Byrd
Marrying into money was not a good thing for me. - Anna Nicole Smith
It's morally wrong to allow a sucker to keep his money. - W. C. Fields
A woman's best protection is a little money of her own. - Clare Boothe Luce
If you want to reap financial blessings, you have to sow financially. - Joel Osteen
No complaint... is more common than that of a scarcity of money. - Adam Smith
After a certain point, money is meaningless. It ceases to be the goal. The game is what counts. - Aristotle Onassis
It is a waste of money to help those who show no desire to help themselves. - Taylor Caldwell
Fortune is like glass - the brighter the glitter, the more easily broken. - Publilius Syrus
Money does not make you happy but it quiets the nerves. - Sean O'Casey
It was an honor and privilege to arrive to this country 16 years ago with almost no money in my pocket. A lot has happened since then. - Antonio Banderas
A penny saved is a penny earned. - Benjamin Franklin
It is not the creation of wealth that is wrong, but the love of money for its own sake. - Margaret Thatcher
There is nothing so habit-forming as money. - Don Marquis
All money means to me is a pride in accomplishment. - Ray Kroc
What counts is what you do with your money, not where it came from. - Merton Miller
As long as I can make lots of money in other businesses, I'll continue to subsidize my own work. - Francis Ford Coppola
Affluence creates poverty. - Marshall McLuhan
Most men love money and security more, and creation and construction less, as they get older. - John Maynard Keynes
Nothing is more dangerous to men than a sudden change of fortune. - Quintilian
Honesty is the best policy - when there is money in it. - Mark Twain
If you can count your money, you don't have a billion dollars. - J. Paul Getty
Money is to my social existence what health is to my body. - Mason Cooley
Very few people can afford to be poor. - George Bernard Shaw
Money just draws flies. - Mahalia Jackson
It doesn't matter about money; having it, not having it. Or having clothes, or not having them. You're still left alone with yourself in the end. - Billy Idol
Neither a borrower nor a lender be. - William Shakespeare

Thirteen thousand dollars a year is not enough to raise a family. That's not enough to pay your bills and save for their future. That's barely enough to provide for even the most basic needs. - Tom Carper
The thing that differentiates man from animals is money. - Gertrude Stein
Money is the barometer of a society's virtue. - Ayn Rand
Civilized countries generally adopt gold or silver or both as money. - Alfred Marshall
If I have enough money to eat I'm good. - Shia LaBeouf
Isn't it a shame that future generations can't be here to see all the wonderful things we're doing with their money? - Earl Wilson
Money differs from an automobile or mistress in being equally important to those who have it and those who do not. - John Kenneth Galbraith
Money equals freedom. - Kevin O'Leary
Well private money can take risks in a way that government money often isn't willing to. - Bill Gates

Bottom line is, I didn't return to Apple to make a fortune. I've been very lucky in my life and already have one. When I was 25, my net worth was $100 million or so. I decided then that I wasn't going to let it ruin my life. There's no way you could ever spend it all, and I don't view wealth as something that validates my intelligence. - Steve Jobs
Many people are in the dark when it comes to money, and I'm going to turn on the lights. - Suze Orman
We go to school to learn to work hard for money. I write books and create products that teach people how to have money work hard for them. - Robert Kiyosaki
I'd rather lose my own money than someone else's. - Dean Kamen
Everyone needs a certain amount of money. Beyond that, we pursue money because we know how to obtain it. We don't necessarily know how to obtain happiness. - Gregg Easterbrook
Many good qualities are not sufficient to balance a single want - the want of money. - Johann Georg Zimmermann
Art for art's sake, money for God's sake. - Simon Raven
The foundation of a financial fresh start actually has nothing to do with money or specific financial dos and don'ts. - Suze Orman
You want 21 percent risk free? Pay off your credit cards. - Andrew Tobias
If you make a living, if you earn your own money, you're free - however free one can be on this planet. - Theodore White
There was a time when a fool and his money were soon parted, but now it happens to everybody. - Adlai Stevenson I
Those who are of the opinion that money will do everything may reasonably be expected to do everything for money. - Edward Wood, 1st Earl of Halifax
Sudden money is going from zero to two hundred dollars a week. The rest doesn't count. - Neil Simon
Research indicates that most women want their man to earn more than they do. - Laura Schlessinger
Business is other people's money. - Delphine de Girardin
I don't think business news is just for old white men with money. - Neil Cavuto
I've looked after my money. As I started working around my third birthday, my first check went straight to the bank. - Samantha Barks
I think that focusing on the money, on the business, is not enough. - Sergei Bubka
I was never sloppy with other people's money. Only my own. Because I figure, well, you can be. - Francis Ford Coppola
An important lever for sustained action in tackling poverty and reducing hunger is money. - Gro Harlem Brundtland
Sometimes your best investments are the ones you don't make. - Donald Trump
Banks have a new image. Now you have 'a friend,' your friendly banker. If the banks are so friendly, how come they chain down the pens? - Alan King
The most beautiful things are not associated with money; they are memories and moments. If you don't celebrate those, they can pass you by. - Alek Wek
Rather than love, than money, than fame, give me truth. - Henry David Thoreau
Money is not the only answer, but it makes a difference. - Barack Obama
Success isn't measured by money or power or social rank. Success is measured by your discipline and inner peace. - Mike Ditka
The sinews of war are infinite money. - Marcus Tullius Cicero
Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art. - Andy Warhol
There is only one boss. The customer. And he can fire everybody in the company from the chairman on down, simply by spending his money somewhere else. - Sam Walton
Time is more value than money. You can get more money, but you cannot get more time. - Jim Rohn
I spent a lot of money on booze, birds and fast cars. The rest I just squandered. - George Best
Giving money and power to government is like giving whiskey and car keys to teenage boys. - P. J. O'Rourke
Money can't buy happiness, but it can make you awfully comfortable while you're being miserable. - Clare Boothe Luce
The way to make money is to buy when blood is running in the streets. - John D. Rockefeller
The greatest legacy one can pass on to one's children and grandchildren is not money or other material things accumulated in one's life, but rather a legacy of character and faith. - Billy Graham
Money and success don't change people; they merely amplify what is already there. - Will Smith

'Park Avenue: Money, Power and the American Dream' is an intentionally angry film. How could it not be when the chance of an infant dying is five times greater on the Bronx Park Avenue than on Manhattan's Park Avenue just across the Harlem River? - Alex Gibney
To give real service you must add something which cannot be bought or measured with money, and that is sincerity and integrity. - Douglas Adams
The first time you marry for love, the second for money, and the third for companionship. - Jackie Kennedy
Work like you don't need the money. Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like nobody's watching. - Satchel Paige
The problem with socialism is that you eventually run out of other peoples' money. - Margaret Thatcher

Labour was the first price, the original purchase - money that was paid for all things. It was not by gold or by silver, but by labour, that all wealth of the world was originally purchased. - Adam Smith

War is hugely profitable. It creates so much money because it's so easy to spend money very fast. There are huge fortunes to be made. So there is always an encouragement to promote war and keep it going, to make sure that we identify people who are 'others' whom we can legitimately make war upon. - Roger Waters
To get rich, you have to be making money while you're asleep. - David Bailey
Rule No.1: Never lose money. Rule No.2: Never forget rule No.1. - Warren Buffett

To make an embarrassing admission, I like video games. That's what got me into software engineering when I was a kid. I wanted to make money so I could buy a better computer to play better video games - nothing like saving the world. - Elon Musk
I think anybody who is interested in keeping their money safe from the criminal banking system would want gold, silver, and Bitcoin. - Max Keiser
Every sale has five basic obstacles: no need, no money, no hurry, no desire, no trust. - Zig Ziglar
Whoever said money can't buy happiness simply didn't know where to go shopping. - Gertrude Stein
Companies figured out that the easiest way to make money was to reissue records that the accounting department had paid for years ago and already made a profit. - Chris Cornell
My favorite things in life don't cost any money. It's really clear that the most precious resource we all have is time. - Steve Jobs
I am not satisfied in making money for myself. I endeavor to provide employment for hundreds of the women of my race. - Madam C. J. Walker
The greatest power is not money power, but political power. - Walter Annenberg
A business that makes nothing but money is a poor business. - Henry Ford
When it is a question of money, everybody is of the same religion. - Voltaire

It is not the style of clothes one wears, neither the kind of automobile one drives, nor the amount of money one has in the bank, that counts. These mean nothing. It is simply service that measures success. - George Washington Carver

Bitcoin is amazingly transformative because it's the first time in the entire history of the world in which anybody can now send or receive any amount of money, with anyone else, anywhere on the planet, without having to ask permission from any bank or government. - Roger Ver

If I meet Putin, I'll say to him: 'So you've finally given us back our territory, how much more are you ready to give as compensation money for taking away our land and helping those who took part in the escalation in Crimea and Donbass?' - Volodymyr Zelensky
He who controls the money supply of a nation controls the nation. - James A. Garfield
Don't worry about being famous or making money; the most important thing is being the best. You have to become a master of your craft, and everything else will come. - Anastasia Soare
If you stop at general math, you're only going to make general math money. - Snoop Dogg
Success comes to those who dedicate everything to their passion in life. To be successful, it is also very important to be humble and never let fame or money travel to your head. - A. R. Rahman
A successful man is one who makes more money than his wife can spend. A successful woman is one who can find such a man. - Lana Turner
I believe that Bitcoin holds value as a form of 'good money' that is superior to any previously discovered or developed form of money. - Jeremy Allaire
It costs a lot of money to look this cheap. - Dolly Parton
Money is like a sixth sense without which you cannot make a complete use of the other five. - W. Somerset Maugham
Always remember, money isn't everything - but also remember to make a lot of it before talking such fool nonsense. - Earl Wilson
Money is human happiness in the abstract; he, then, who is no longer capable of enjoying human happiness in the concrete devotes himself utterly to money. - Arthur Schopenhauer

From my experience and understanding, I believe money follows name and fame, while recognition calls for a huge amount of sacrifice. To get something, you have to lose something. That's the rule of life. - Lata Mangeshkar
Money can't buy you happiness, but it can buy you a yacht big enough to pull up right alongside it. - David Lee Roth

There's nothing more satisfying than seeing a happy and smiling child. I always help in any way I can, even if it's just by signing an autograph. A child's smile is worth more than all the money in the world. - Lionel Messi
What's money? A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and goes to bed at night and in between does what he wants to do. - Bob Dylan
Sex is like money; only too much is enough. - John Updike
Friends and good manners will carry you where money won't go. - Margaret Walker
I don't fight for the money. I fight for my legacy. I fight for history. I fight for my people. - Khabib Nurmagomedov
I believe that sex is one of the most beautiful, natural, wholesome things that money can buy. - Steve Martin
The key to making money is to stay invested. - Suze Orman
Money can buy you a fine dog, but only love can make him wag his tail. - Kinky Friedman
Too many people spend money they haven't earned to buy things they don't want to impress people they don't like. - Will Rogers

War is big business. It's a lot of money going to and fro, and unfortunately a lot of angst, and a lot of fear, and a lot of doubt. And eventually a lot of wonderful people, like soldiers, like men and women that are out there trying to do the best they can, they come back being wounded on many levels. - Jon Anderson
It will be a great day when our schools have all the money they need, and our air force has to have a bake-sale to buy a bomber. - Robert Fulghum
You are your greatest asset. Put your time, effort and money into training, grooming, and encouraging your greatest asset. - Tom Hopkins
I'm tired of hearing about money, money, money, money, money. I just want to play the game, drink Pepsi, wear Reebok. - Shaquille O'Neal
When I get a little money I buy books; and if any is left I buy food and clothes. - Desiderius Erasmus

I always want to say to people who want to be rich and famous: 'try being rich first'. See if that doesn't cover most of it. There's not much downside to being rich, other than paying taxes and having your relatives ask you for money. But when you become famous, you end up with a 24-hour job. - Bill Murray
For me, money is not my definition of success. Inspiring people is a definition of success. - Kanye West
The writer must earn money in order to be able to live and to write, but he must by no means live and write for the purpose of making money. - Karl Marx
Capital isn't this pile of money sitting somewhere; it's an accounting construct. - Bethany McLean
Making money is a hobby that will complement any other hobbies you have, beautifully. - Scott Alexander
No man but a blockhead ever wrote except for money. - Samuel Johnson

Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies are a form of money that's a stable field that the government can't destroy and can't distort. Because its creation is governed by the laws of mathematics. It can't happen any faster or slower than a certain rate, and it all sort of self-adjusts. - Patrick M. Byrne
Recommend virtue to your children; it alone, not money, can make them happy. I speak from experience. - Ludwig van Beethoven
You must spend money to make money. - Plautus
Attitude is more important than the past, than education, than money, than circumstances, than what people do or say. It is more important than appearance, giftedness, or skill. - Charles R. Swindoll
Most people work just hard enough not to get fired and get paid just enough money not to quit. - George Carlin

I call Alibaba '1,001 mistakes.' We expanded too fast, and then in the dot-com bubble, we had to have layoffs. By 2002, we had only enough cash to survive for 18 months. We had a lot of free members using our site, and we didn't know how we'd make money. So we developed a product for China exporters to meet U.S. buyers online. This model saved us. - Jack Ma
Success is not just making money. Success is happiness. Success is fulfillment; it's the ability to give. - Adam Neumann

Nothing makes you feel better than when you get into a hotel bed, and the sheets feel so good. Why shouldn't you wake up like that every day? Spend money on your mattress and bedding because these things make a difference on your sleep and, ultimately, your happiness. - Bobby Berk
If you don't have integrity, you have nothing. You can't buy it. You can have all the money in the world, but if you are not a moral and ethical person, you really have nothing. - Henry Kravis

Money doesn't mean anything to me. I've made a lot of money, but I want to enjoy life and not stress myself building my bank account. I give lots away and live simply, mostly out of a suitcase in hotels. We all know that good health is much more important. - Keanu Reeves
Money can't buy life. - Bob Marley
Life started getting good when I started making money. - Balthazar Getty
When you ain't got no money, you gotta get an attitude. - Richard Pryor
I made my money by selling too soon. - Bernard Baruch
If you can actually count your money, then you're not a rich man. - J. Paul Getty

Money and corruption are ruining the land, crooked politicians betray the working man, pocketing the profits and treating us like sheep, and we're tired of hearing promises that we know they'll never keep. - Ray Davies

Allah says in the Qur'an not to despise one another. So the criterion in Islam is not color or social status. It's who is most righteous. If I go to a mosque - and I'm a basketball player with money and prestige - if I go to a mosque and see an imam, I feel inferior. He's better than me. It's about knowledge. - Hakeem Olajuwon
The money's the same, whether you earn it or scam it. - Bobby Heenan
I can make more generals, but horses cost money. - Abraham Lincoln

Success is not defined by money or status, necessarily, but by how many people you've impacted and how fulfilled you feel with your decisions. If you can garner all of these things, then more power and success to you, but all in all, you must feel happy and satisfied with what you personally have put out into the world. - Kirstin Maldonado
If money help a man to do good to others, it is of some value; but if not, it is simply a mass of evil, and the sooner it is got rid of, the better. - Swami Vivekananda
Victory is everything. You can spend the money but you can never spend the memories. - Ken Venturi
Don't stay in bed, unless you can make money in bed. - George Burns
My principles are more important than the money or my title. - Muhammad Ali

I'm much more confident with crypto than with banks or fiat currency because I can actually control it, and the money supply is transparent, stated up front. It makes online shopping a lot easier and a lot safer. - Erik Voorhees
Success is having to worry about every damn thing in the world, except money. - Johnny Cash

You should breathe deeply and chant, 'Money will easily and effortlessly flow into my life' as often as you can every day. Things will start to change after a month. If you believe you will be financially secure, then you are opening yourself up to change. - Louise L. Hay
I don't pay good wages because I have a lot of money; I have a lot of money because I pay good wages. - Robert Bosch
You aren't wealthy until you have something money can't buy. - Garth Brooks
I am sure that no man can derive more pleasure from money or power than I do from seeing a pair of basketball goals in some out of the way place. - James Naismith
If you work just for money, you'll never make it, but if you love what you're doing and you always put the customer first, success will be yours. - Ray Kroc

The TV business is uglier than most things. It is normally perceived as some kind of cruel and shallow money trench through the heart of the journalism industry, a long plastic hallway where thieves and pimps run free and good men die like dogs, for no good reason. - Hunter S. Thompson
Making money is a happiness. And that's a great incentive. Making other people happy is a super-happiness. - Muhammad Yunus

Football is now all about money. There are problems with the values within the game. This is sad because football is the most beautiful game. We can play it in the street. We can play it everywhere. - Johan Cruyff
Words are the money of fools. - Thomas Hobbes
The real key to making money in stocks is not to get scared out of them. - Peter Lynch
It's about legacy, it's about moments, it's about being an icon - I'll do what I do and the money will flow. - Israel Adesanya

Maturity: Be able to stick with a job until it is finished. Be able to bear an injustice without having to get even. Be able to carry money without spending it. Do your duty without being supervised. - Ann Landers

I believe that if you work hard and you never get to enjoy it then what's the point. You can't take any of this with you, the money or nothing. The only thing you can take is experiences, memories and good times, so I like to get amongst it as much as I can. - Jay Sean
Life is a game. Money is how we keep score. - Ted Turner
The big difference between sex for money and sex for free is that sex for money usually costs a lot less. - Brendan Behan

I've never chased money. It's always been about what I can do to motivate and inspire people. - Tyler Perry

I spent three days a week for 10 years educating myself in the public library, and it's better than college. People should educate themselves - you can get a complete education for no money. At the end of 10 years, I had read every book in the library and I'd written a thousand stories. - Ray Bradbury
It is easy to be independent when you've got money. But to be independent when you haven't got a thing, that's the Lord's test. - Mahalia Jackson
If I was a billionaire, I'd be smart with my money. - Bruno Mars
I went to the bank and asked to borrow a cup of money. They said, 'What for?' I said, 'I'm going to buy some sugar.' - Steven Wright
First and foremost I am a drummer. After that, I'm other things... But I didn't play drums to make money. - Ringo Starr
No, not rich. I am a poor man with money, which is not the same thing. - Gabriel Garcia Marquez
The only point in making money is, you can tell some big shot where to go. - Humphrey Bogart
Time is money says the proverb, but turn it around and you get a precious truth. Money is time. - George Gissing

Money plays an important role in football, but it is not the dominating factor. When Chelsea play a Carling Cup game in a small city, and it could result in a draw - the excitement, the spirit, the atmosphere - that's the real beauty of football in England. - Roman Abramovich
Why is there so much month left at the end of the money? - John Barrymore

I was 12 years fittin' to be a billionaire; I was 15 years old as a millionaire. I've been rich since I was 14. My son has been a millionaire since he was 12, so that's just the life. We've been playing with money since young. - Birdman
Successful people make money. It's not that people who make money become successful, but that successful people attract money. They bring success to what they do. - Wayne Dyer
The price we have to pay for money is sometimes liberty. - Robert Louis Stevenson

One of our things is that money follows; it does not lead. So we want people that are fired up and passionate about their mission... and people that aren't so married to spreadsheets and thinking that kind of voodoo controls the future. Because it doesn't. - Dan Gilbert
I had more clothes than I had closets, more cars than garage space, but no money. - Sammy Davis, Jr.
Oh God, you know I have no money, but you can make the people do for me, and you must make the people do for me. - Sojourner Truth
